bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Making High-Direct-Voltage Tests on Power Cable Systems in the Field
IEEE Guide for Making High-Direct-Voltage Tests on Power Cable Systems in the Field

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by 400-1991. This guide lists the various field test methods that are currently available or under development with guidance on how to perform each test. The guide covers shielded, insulated power cable systems rated 5 kV through 500 kV unless these voltages are modified by the specific “point” document.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
